overview_of_class:
Topics in Seventeenth-Century Music: Affect and Passion in Baroque Music
Considers instrumental and vocal repertory from the "long seventeenth century" (ca. 1580-1720) against the intellectual and cultural background of an era that emphasized the capacity of the arts to move the affections and alter the emotions of listeners, performers, and spectators. Students will have the opportunity to perform and/or compose in seventeenth-century styles.
name: Seminar in 17th Century Music
